Header: Operator of a robbery gang arrested in Kohuwala
Content: An operator of gang responsible for thefts in several  business centers around Colombo, has been arrested in Kohuwala. The 43 year old who was arrested yesterday is a resident of Kirulapone. It was revealed during interrogation, that several robberies were carried out in many areas including Moratuwa, Mt. Lavinia, Dehiwala and Kohuwala during the past few months. Cash, gold jewelry, silver items, prepaid mobile phone reload cards and medical equipment was found in the suspect’s possession.
